Her study room is a storage unit inside the hospital, which medical staff have nicknamed "a classroom where dreams begin." https://t.co/vOWW2lTPGd

He says Shanghai welcomed Jewish refugees with open arms during WWII, and he wants to repay the kindness his community received. https://t.co/oZfufG68vd

The baby's mother is a medical professional who contracted the virus at work, and his grandparents have also been quarantined. https://t.co/t8FTwrnRjf

He didn’t even leave his name and only said he’s a “Changzhou resident” (CCTV photos) https://t.co/fCsLZ7yN3k
